title: These Damned Hands /// Part 1 /// 478
description:
These Damned Hands /// Part 1 /// 478

Part 1 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week we go up to Canada to explore some older cases from the Sixties, Seventies and Eighties. All of the cases are centered around two main perpetrators. Our story starts off with several missing persons cases. Join us as we take a look at some fascinating crime stories that you likely have yet to hear.

Beer of the Week - Honest Trav’s Dive Bar Ale by Saucony Creek Brewing Company Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 Bottle Caps

Our show - True Crime Garage “Off the Record” is available only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
